SELECT oi.id, oi.code , oi.remark , oi.total_price AS totalPrice , oi.handler_code AS handlerCode, oi.create_time AS createTime, si.staff_name AS handlerName, si.avatar AS handlerAvatar FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON oi.handler_code = si.staff_code WHERE 1 = 1
and si.staff_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.handlerName},'%')
and oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')

SELECT si.id, si.material_name AS materialName, si.material_type AS materialType, si.measurement_unit AS measurementUnit, si.quantity, si.transaction_type AS transactionType, si.create_date AS createDate, si.remark, si.model, si.unit_price AS unitPrice, pri.name AS materialTypeName FROM storehouse_info si LEFT JOIN order_info oi on oi.code = si.delivery_order_number LEFT JOIN product_type_info pri ON (pri.id = si.material_type) WHERE 1 = 1 and oi.code = #{code} ORDER BY si.create_date DESC

SELECT date_format( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) days, sum( l.quantity ) AS quantity, sum( l.totalPrice ) AS totalPrice FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) ) AS spo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.create_time, si.material_type, si.quantity, si.unit_price * si.quantity AS totalPrice FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN storehouse_info si ON si.delivery_order_number = oi.CODE ) AS l ON ( DATE_FORMAT( l.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days
